title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5905.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5905.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of these rules and regulations is to set forth
the methods and procedures governing the award of State research contracts by
the New York State Science and Technology Foundation to applicants who have
been awarded Phase I funding under the Small Business Innovation Research Act
of 1982 ( P.L. 97-219). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5905.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
